page.title: 14Sport in the Area
page.content: The village has a football team. The team plays in a local Sunday league. They only formed the team last year. The player/manager is called Tony Deacon. The school has a team aswell. The school plays on their own pitch and the senior team plays on the Peace Memorial field. Over the Peace Memorial field there is a cricket pitch.North Bradley hasn't a team of their own. Mostly it is used by Tesco cricket team. The school has got a chess team and netball team aswell as the footbal team and did have a cricket team. The village hasn't got a swimming pool or running tracks. Most the villagers go to closeby towns for their sporting activities. If people in the area want to watch live professional sports they would have to go to Bath, Bristol, Swindon and other big cities.
